Notes: part of autologous blood transfusion process
LABEL: Cell Saver

Notes: This type of FFP has been in use over a decade.
LABEL: ESDEP (Solvent / Detergent Virus-Inactivated Plasma)

Notes: GTT has to do with rate of infusion
LABEL: FFP GTT

Notes: Blood that was ordered but not transfused.
LABEL: RBC waste

Notes: human erythropoietin produced in cell culture
LABEL: EPOGEN
